attributes.action: Please put frontline policeman higher on the cohort list for vaccines.
attributes.additional_details: To protect the lives of the public, policeman and their families. To show you value their efforts and public services.
attributes.background: Please put frontline policeman higher up on the cohort list for vaccination, regardless of age. Unlike some of the other groups on the vaccination cohort, they work with the public daily and have to deal with people who aren’t adhering to government guidelines, putting themselves and others at risk.
